divs: Sighting DetailsI(CHRIS) WAS IN FRONT YARD(FACES EAST) ABOUT 8:30PM ON DEC. 25, 2007. I LOOKED UP IN EASTERN SKY AND SAW A BRIGHT LIGHT. IT MOVED LEFT AND RIGHT. I LOOKED AT STARS AND THEY WERENT MOVING. I WENT INTO HOUSE AND ASKED WIFE, ELAINE, TO COME OUTSIDE. I(ELAINE) WENT TO FRONT YARD AND SAW A GOLD LIGHT IN EASTERN SKY AND SOUTH OF MOON. IT MOVED BACK AND FORTH AND CAME FORWARD, SPINNING.. THERE WAS A WHITE HAZE AROUND IT. WE STOOD IN FRONT YARD LOOKING INTO EASTERN SKY.WE THOUGHT IT WAS A BRIGHT STAR BUT IT MOVED BACK AND FORTH AND CAME FORWARD AND WAS SPINNING. IT WAS MOVING PARALLEL WITH THE MOON. (AND MOON WAS IN THE BEGINNING WANING STAGE) WE COULDNT GET TELESCOPE OR BINOCULARS TO FOCUS. IT WAS COLD. MR EAKINS MOTHER AND SISTER PLUS 2 NEIGHBORS ALSO SAW IT. THE BRIGHT LIGHT WAS ABOUT THE 4PM ANGLE. IT WAS A CLEAR NIGHT. THE ROUND OBJECT GRADUALLY ROTATED AND HOVERED. THERE WAS A RED,STEADY YELLOW LIGHT . FINALLY IT WAS TOO COLD TO BE OUTSIDE SO WE WENT IN ABOUT 11;30P
trends: There have been no other sightings in AVON(INDPLS. AREA)
This sighting has never been favorited.
